title: The most affordable digital cameras by average price
summary: The graph shows the Average price of digital Camera by brand .
You can see that Konica has the lowest Average price , averaging at £ 53.5 , Hunten is a little bit higher coming in at £ 58 .
Sigma is a little higher again , coming in at £ 62.3 ; Then a bit more of a jump to £ 70.1 for Memoto and the most expensive , £ 75.9 Average for Cambo Camera .
gold: This chart shows the most affordable digital camera by the average price in pound sterling . \n It shows that Konica is the cheapest at £ 53 , Hunten is the next cheapest at £ 58 . This is followed by Sigma at £ 62 , Memoto at £ 70 and the most expensive is Cambo at £ 76 .
